text:
Company: Lewis-Shields
Role: Retail Salesperson

We're seeking a results-driven retail salesperson to join our team at Lewis-Shields. As a salesperson, you will be responsible for driving sales growth, providing exceptional customer service, and maintaining a competitive edge in the market.

To succeed in this role, you should be a driven individual with a strong work ethic and a passion for achieving results. You'll need to be able to work well under pressure, think strategically, and have excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities:

 Meet and exceed sales targets
 Provide exceptional customer service and build strong relationships with customers
 Maintain a thorough knowledge of our products and services
 Collaborate with the sales team to achieve shared goals

Qualifications and Experience:

 1-2 years of retail sales experience
 Proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $40,000 to $60,000, based on your experience and skills.
 Opportunities for career advancement and professional development
 A dynamic and supportive work environment
